title: Tex-mex bean burritos
ingredients: ['1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 chopped onion', '1 crushed garlic clove', '1 green chilli', '1 chopped red pepper', '420g can baked beans', '1/2 tsp dried oregano', '8 soft flour tortilla wraps', '1 shredded cos lettuce', '125g grated Cheddar cheese', '150g plain yoghurt', 'ready-made tomato salsa']
